title: Hey, I miss you so much. Remember when we used to ...

messages.content: Hey, I miss you so much. Remember when we used to talk about our dreams?
I remember those conversations about your dreams of becoming a developer. You were so passionate about JavaScript and AI.
I love you for remembering that. It means everything to me.
I'm grateful for our friendship. Even though we're apart, these memories keep us connected.
Sometimes I'm scared about the future, but talking to you helps me feel better.
I understand that fear. Remember, we're in this together, even when we're not physically close.
Thank you for being such a good friend. I'm happy we can still laugh and hang out like this.
I love our conversations too. They bring me so much joy, even when we're just talking about code or dreams.
